about_the_game:
In the heart of Felinsha sits a quaint little shop called "Ragamuffins"; a hub of buying, selling, and gossip. Although quite a new establishment, Ragamuffins has become a firm favourite with the locals; little do the villagers realise that the shop is simply a front for a family of feline fencers, out on the prowl nightly, stealing anything that's not nailed down.

Ragamuffins is a Unique item shop meets card battle game... with cats... with hats.

Key features:



Manage your shop – buy, sell and barter and remember to keep those shelves stocked and the family fed. By night send out those kittens to earn their keep, Searching and stealing from the people of Felinsha.

Features


  • Multiple weapons: Get all the weapons at your disposal to escape the guards and find everything from cat bows to mystical cat spells.

  • Survival strategy: Each level is a battle not to get caught; you can only carry so much, so carrying loot over health and weapons can cause things to go wrong quickly!

  • Unravel the dark underworld of Felinsha, political deception, mafia control, and police corruption; everything isn't quite as cute and fluffy as it first seemed...

  • Unravel the dark underworld of Felinsha, political deception, mafia control, and police corruption; everything isn't quite as cute and fluffy as it first seemed...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: AMD Zen 2 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RDNA 2 graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: AMD Zen 2 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RDNA 2 graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Ragamuffins: Feline Fencers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Unique item shop meets card battle game... with cats... with hats.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Swedish*, Afrikaans*
*languages with full audio support
